channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Bookshop Cancels an Event Over a Rabbi’s Zionism, Prompting Outrage
item.description: Shortly before a talk between a Jewish author and a liberal rabbi, a manager at Powerhouse Arena in Brooklyn barred the rabbi from participating, sayi...

item.description: After an investigation that ran in The New York Times, the industry is edging toward change. But companies in western India are reluctant to abandon a...

item.title: There are 3 major theories as to why Mike Lynch’s Bayesian yacht sank so fast
item.description: The boat’s maker says the crew should have had time to rescue passengers.

item.title: Russian Attitudes About Putin Might Be Shifting
item.description: Negative remarks on social media have increased since Ukrainian troops launched an incursion, according to a firm that tracks Russian attitudes.

item.title: Doritos teams with SpaceX, St. Jude’s for new ‘Zero Gravity’ Cool Ranch chips
item.description: Chips were designed to keep their flavor in outer space, company says.

item.title: U.S. Open: What You Need to Know
item.description: The tournament runs Aug. 26 to Sept. 8 at the Billie Jean King National Tennis Center in New York City.

item.title: Mike Lynch’s Body Found After Sicily Yacht Sinking, Official Says
item.description: The authorities have recovered the bodies of all but one of the six people missing after disaster struck a yacht carrying the British software tycoon.

item.title: Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck are splitting after two years. Here are your divorce odds, experts say
30-Year Mortgage Rate Dips to 6.46%; Home Sales Rise
item.description: Home buyers this week saw the lowest average rate since early 2023, and existing-home sales rebounded in July. Analysts predict more relief ahead.

item.title: Officials Try to Salvage Negotiations for a Cease-Fire in Gaza
item.description: Biden said that talks in Cairo could “remove any remaining obstacles,” but Israel and Hamas are skeptical.

item.title: Gen Z and millennials flock to places with these attributes—key to winning the war for talent
item.description: Understanding why Gen Zers and millennials choose a particular city has never been more important given aging populations.

item.description: The authorities have recovered the bodies of all but one of the six people missing after disaster struck a yacht carrying the British software tycoon.

item.title: Silvio Santos, Provocative Brazilian Television Host, Dies at 93

item.title: A German diaspora in North Carolina is booming thanks to a multibillion-dollar investment from Germany, but a potential Trump Presidency is causing anxiety
item.description: Thousands of Germans have flocked to North Carolina in recent years, aided by investments from Siemens and Daimler.
